languages.text: "Здесь не бывает людей. Мы могли возносить молитвы не опасаясь раскрытия. И вид мертвых еретиков... радовал нас! Попирать ваши кости было богоугодно! Потому я приказал вскрыть стены вашего хранилища костей и устроить здесь убежище Конгрегации!" {n}Мутант мерзко ухмыляется.{/n}

"None wander in here. We were free to offer our prayers without fear of discovery. And the sight of dead heretics... was pleasing! Trampling your bones was a righteous act! That is why I ordered the pure to sunder the walls of your bone vault and make this place a sanctuary for the Congregation!" {n}He sneers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Здесь не бывает людей. Мы могли возносить молитвы не опасаясь раскрытия. И вид мертвых еретиков... радовал нас! Попирать ваши кости было богоугодно! Потому я приказал вскрыть стены вашего хранилища костей и устроить здесь убежище Конгрегации!" {n}Мутант мерзко ухмыляется.{/n}

languages.text: « Personne ne vient jamais ici. Nous étions libres de prier sans craindre d'être découverts. Et quelle vue agréable que tous ces cadavres d'hérétiques ! Fouler vos ossements au pied était un acte juste ! Voilà pourquoi j'ai ordonné aux purs de briser les murs de votre tombeau et de faire de cet endroit un sanctuaire pour la Congrégation ! » {n}ricane-t-il avec mépris.{/n}
languages.original_text: "None wander in here. We were free to offer our prayers without fear of discovery. And the sight of dead heretics... was pleasing! Trampling your bones was a righteous act! That is why I ordered the pure to sunder the walls of your bone vault and make this place a sanctuary for the Congregation!" {n}He sneers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Personne ne vient jamais ici. Nous étions libres de prier sans craindre d'être découverts. Et quelle vue agréable que tous ces cadavres d'hérétiques ! Fouler vos ossements au pied était un acte juste ! Voilà pourquoi j'ai ordonné aux purs de briser les murs de votre tombeau et de faire de cet endroit un sanctuaire pour les fidèles ! » {n}ricane-t-il avec mépris.{/n}

languages.text: «Nadie viene aquí. Éramos libres de ofrecer nuestras plegarias sin miedo a ser descubiertos. Y ver herejes muertos... ¡era placentero! ¡Aplastar vuestros huesos era un acto de justicia! ¡Por eso ordené a los puros que derribaran los muros de vuestra cámara de cadáveres y convirtieran a este lugar en un santuario para la congregación!». {n}Te lanza una mirada de desprecio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "None wander in here. We were free to offer our prayers without fear of discovery. And the sight of dead heretics... was pleasing! Trampling your bones was a righteous act! That is why I ordered the pure to sunder the walls of your bone vault and make this place a sanctuary for the Congregation!" {n}He sneers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nadie viene aquí. Éramos libres de ofrecer nuestras plegarias sin miedo a ser descubiertos. Y ver herejes muertos... ¡era placentero! ¡Aplastar vuestros huesos era un acto de justicia! ¡Por eso ordené a los puros que derribaran los muros de vuestra cámara de cadáveres y convirtieran a este lugar en un santuario para los fieles!». {n}Te lanza una mirada de desprecio.{/n}

languages.text: “因为没有人会在这里游荡，我们可以自由祈祷，不用担心被人发现。而且，践踏那些异端分子的尸体……让人无比愉悦！践踏你们的遗骨是正义的行为！正因如此，我命令纯洁之人拆掉了尸体仓库的墙，把这里变成了虔诚教众的圣地！”{n}他冷嘲热讽道。{/n}
languages.original_text: "None wander in here. We were free to offer our prayers without fear of discovery. And the sight of dead heretics... was pleasing! Trampling your bones was a righteous act! That is why I ordered the pure to sunder the walls of your bone vault and make this place a sanctuary for the Congregation!" {n}He sneers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “因为没有人会在这里游荡，我们可以自由祈祷，不用担心被人发现。而且，看到那些异端分子的尸体……让人无比愉悦！践踏你们的遗骨是正义的行为！正因如此，我命令纯洁之人把尸体仓库的墙拆掉了，把这里变成了虔诚之人的圣地！”{n}他冷嘲热讽道。{/n}

languages.text: 「ここには誰も迷い込んでこない。発見される心配もなく、自由に祈りを捧げることができた。異端者の死骸を見るのは…喜ばしいことだ！お前の骨を踏み砕くのは正義の行為だ！だから私は純粋な者たちに命じて、お前の骨保管庫の壁を壊させ、ここを信徒団のための聖域としたのだ！」{n}彼は嘲笑した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "None wander in here. We were free to offer our prayers without fear of discovery. And the sight of dead heretics... was pleasing! Trampling your bones was a righteous act! That is why I ordered the pure to sunder the walls of your bone vault and make this place a sanctuary for the Congregation!" {n}He sneers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ここには誰も迷い込んでこない。発見される心配もなく、自由に祈りを捧げることができた。異端者の死骸を見るのは…喜ばしいことだ！お前の骨を踏み砕くのは正義の行為だ！だから私は純粋な者たちに命じて、お前の骨保管庫の壁を壊させ、ここを信者のための聖域としたのだ！」{n}彼は嘲笑した。{/n}

languages.text: "Niemand kommt je hierher. Wir konnten beten, ohne Sorge zu haben, entdeckt zu werden. Und der Anblick toter Ketzer ... war erfreulich! Auf Euren Knochen herumzutrampeln, war ein rechtschaffener Akt! Darum habe ich den Reinen befohlen, die Wände Eures Knochengewölbes zu zertrümmern und hier ein Heiligtum der Kongregation zu errichten!" {n}Er schnaubt verächtlich auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "None wander in here. We were free to offer our prayers without fear of discovery. And the sight of dead heretics... was pleasing! Trampling your bones was a righteous act! That is why I ordered the pure to sunder the walls of your bone vault and make this place a sanctuary for the Congregation!" {n}He sneers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Niemand kommt je hierher. Wir konnten beten, ohne Sorge zu haben, entdeckt zu werden. Und der Anblick toter Ketzer ... war erfreulich! Auf Euren Knochen herumzutrampeln, war ein rechtschaffener Akt! Darum habe ich den Reinen befohlen, die Wände Eures Knochengewölbes zu zertrümmern und hier ein Heiligtum für die Gläubigen zu errichten! {n}Er schnaubt verächtlich auf.{/n}

languages.text: "Buraya kimse gelmez. Keşfedilme korkusu olmadan dualarımızı özgürce okuyorduk. Ayrıca ölü kâfirlerle dolu manzaramız da... Hoştu! Kemiklerinizi çiğnemek, doğrucu bir eylemdi! Saf olanlara, kemik mahzeninizin duvarlarını parçalayıp burayı cemaatimiz için bir sığınak hâline getirmelerini bu yüzden emrettim!" {n}Alaylı bir şekilde dudağını büküyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "None wander in here. We were free to offer our prayers without fear of discovery. And the sight of dead heretics... was pleasing! Trampling your bones was a righteous act! That is why I ordered the pure to sunder the walls of your bone vault and make this place a sanctuary for the Congregation!" {n}He sneers.{/n}
